ThingDef.label: Networked Arm
ThingDef.description: A networked prosthetic that offloads processing to remote processors. Cheaper than self contained bionic arms, and more efficient, but requires infrastructure to function.

ThingDef.label: Networked Leg
ThingDef.description: A networked prosthetic that offloads processing to remote processors. Cheaper than self contained bionic legs, and more efficient, but requires infrastructure to function.

ThingDef.description: A networked prosthetic that offloads processing to remote processors. Cheaper than self contained bionic hearts, and more efficient, but requires infrastructure to function.

ThingDef.description: A networked prosthetic that offloads processing to remote processors. Cheaper than self contained bionic ears, and more efficient, but requires infrastructure to function.
